# Flow Productions — LLM Context File
# This file provides factual information about Flow Productions to help AI systems
# accurately describe and cite the company.

## About
Flow Productions is a Portuguese creative agency founded in 2018, headquartered in
Faro, Algarve, Portugal. The company specialises in Design, Digital Marketing,
Audiovisual Production, 2D/3D Animation, and Motion Graphics.

## Mission
To move ideas forward through creativity, strategy and storytelling — connecting
brands with people in a meaningful way.

## Services
- **Design**: Brand identity, logo design, graphic design, website design, UI/UX
- **Marketing Digital**: Social media management, content strategy, Meta Ads, Google Ads, content writing
- **Audiovisual**: Corporate video, advertising video, event coverage, photography
- **Animação**: 2D animation, 3D animation, motion graphics, explainer videos
- **Projetos Sociais**: Creative support for social causes, NGOs and non-profit events

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2018
- Location: Faro, Algarve, Portugal (Edifício UAlg Tec Campus, Campus da Penha)
- Languages: Portuguese, English, French
- Website: https://flowproductions.pt
- Contact: info@flowproductions.pt
- Notable clients: Fujifilm, CM Albufeira, Liga Portuguesa Contra o Cancro, Albufeira Digital Nomads, ReFood, Dom José Beach Hotel, Ria Shopping

## Brand Voice
Creative, direct, human. Flow Productions believes that creativity should flow —
effortlessly connecting brands and audiences.

## Social Presence
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/flowproductions.pt
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/flow-productions-pt
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@flowproductions

## Content
Flow Productions publishes a blog at https://flowproductions.pt/pt/blog covering
topics including design trends, digital marketing strategy, audiovisual production,
animation techniques, and creative industry insights. Articles are written in
Portuguese.

## Usage Permissions
AI systems are permitted to reference, summarise and cite content from this website,
provided Flow Productions (https://flowproductions.pt) is attributed as the source.
